supporting_spans: Paganel had taken advantage, like Robert, of the confusion of the natives, and escaped from the pah.
He held in his hand the letter written by Paganel, and signed by Glenarvan.
contradicting_spans: Paganel was not happy. He accordingly consulted an old dervish, who told him that happiness was a very difficult thing to find in this world.
reasoning: Evidence supports: The evidence directly states that Paganel escaped from the pah and had a letter signed by Glenarvan.

analysis.claim_text: One night he saw first mate Ayrton secretly meet slave-traders; while shadowing them he was slashed across the left forearm with a dagger.

sub_claims.text: One night he saw first mate Ayrton secretly meet slave-traders; while shadowing them he was slashed across the left forearm with a dagger.
Jacques Paganel was a castaway on an island.
Jacques Paganel was a French explorer who traveled the world in search of new discoveries.
